level.text: This chapter shall apply to applicants for and holders of a certificate as a trained medication employee, employed to work in a program, who administer medications to persons with mental retardation or other disabilities, and sets forth requirements for:
The administration of medication to persons with mental retardation or other developmental disabilities;
The certification of trained medication employees;
The certification of medication administration trainers and master trainers; and
The employment and supervision of trained medication employees.
